Text.Page: Take this to Consul Dougal, in Velika. Tell him I sent you. Please hurry.

It's rare to see Mattin speak of anyone in such glowing terms. You certainly impressed him, .

Why don't you deliver this little epistle to Samael? He's as hard to win over as Mattin, but if anything can do it, it's this report.

Well done, . This is exactly the kind of action we need from our soldiers right now.

Hmm. Well, this is quite a report. I guess you're not the keener I took you for. I underestimated you. I guarantee I won't do that again in the future.

We need more than just soldiers, we need leaders. Dougal thinks you're ready for a commission. I'm hardly going to argue against it, not after deeds such as these. Come, it's not every day you get to be a hero.
Do you have something to report?

!

I'll let the federation administrators know about this. Your accomplishments will be known throughout the land!

I thank you on behalf of the federation.
I want you to keep it up.
